name: Neural Cloud Interface
tags: req_spaceport, special, no_build_in, sangvis, restricted, no_drop, no_drop_salvage
desc: This ship's functions are controlled by a Neural Cloud Interface, designed to accommodate T-doll personnel. Fewer crew are required to operate the vessel, but the bulky NCI equipment restricts crew space, and human crew suffer increased strain from combat operation.
short: Halves minimum crew and max crew. Max CR reduced by %s unless crewed by T-doll personnel.
